name: Malte Spitz: Your phone company is watching
description: What kind of data is your cell phone company collecting? Malte Spitz wasnâ€™t too worried when he asked his operator in Germany to share information stored about him. Multiple unanswered requests and a lawsuit later, Spitz received 35,830 lines of code -- a detailed, nearly minute-by-minute account of half a year of his life.
